item.title: How do I build a site like this one?
item.description: What you need? A domain name, you can use any Install hugo, see here. To create a static site using prebuilt templates/themes. A github account, see here. To host your webpage on githubpages. A dns provider. I’ve used cloudflare. But you can use which you find easy to setup.
